content: प्रसाधनं {@--1@} Accomplishing, effecting, bringing about. {@--2@} Setting in order, arranging. {@--3@} Decorating, ornamenting, embellishing; toilet, dress; <ls>Ku. 4. 18.</ls> {@--4@} A decoration, ornament, means of decoration or ornament; <ls>Ku. 7. 13</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 7.">30.</ls> --नः, --नं, --नी A comb.
